text: Ropica vinacea is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Pascoe in 1865. It is known from Borneo, Sumatra, and Malaysia.BioLib.cz - Ropica vinacea. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ropica (genus) Category:Beetles described in 1865
title: Ropica vinacea
